ygData.subject: Inspecting
ygData.msgSnippet: It is not totally realistic that someone can look at all of your equipment. As a wizard, how do people see what kind of belt and pants I am wearing? They
ygData.messageBody:
It is not totally realistic that someone can look at all of your equipment.
As a wizard, how do people "see" what kind of belt and pants I am wearing?
They have to peek UNDER my robe. Now if someone came up to you in real life
and lifted up YOUR robe to what was underneath... :)

Usually if I wish to inspect someone I ask. I find that way to be the
polite way. No one ever says no.

May all of you level tomorrow, twice!,

Myrddin Dreamweaver
Wizard of the Veeshan Plane
Leader of the Brotherhood of Balance
